alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 9:39PM EDT until October 01 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Connecticut... Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam affecting New Haven and Fairfield Counties. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon and continue falling to 8.9 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Fri 9 pm: 16.2 Forecast: Sat 2 am 16.1 Sat 8 am 14.6 Sat 2 pm 13.7 Sat 8 pm 12.9 Sun 2 am 12.2 Sun 8 am 11.6 Sun 2 pm 11.1 Sun 8 pm 10.6 Mon 2 am 10.1 Mon 8 am 9.7 Mon 2 pm 9.3 &&
